channel.title: Sun2Surf
channel.description: Malaysia Source for News and Lifestyle

item.title: Large explosions at British fuel depot an 'accident
item.description: HEMEL HEMPSTEAD: Explosions tore through a fuel depot north of London before dawn on Sunday, creating a huge tower of smoke and flame and seriously injuring two people in what police said appeared to be an accident.[Full Story]

item.title: theSun to raise circulation to 200,000 copies
item.description: theSun will boost its print run and circulation to 200,000 copies early next year from 150,000 copies now to meet the increasing demand for Malaysia's only free newspaper.[Full Story]

item.title: Large explosions at fuel depot north of London
item.description: LONDON: A series of explosions and a massive fire erupted at a fuel depot north of London before dawn on Sunday and sent a large column of black smoke into the sky, witnesses said.[Full Story]

item.title: Racial tensions spark Sydney beach violence
item.description: SYDNEY: Racial tensions erupted into violence on a Sydney beach on Sunday when some 5,000 people, some yelling racist chants, converged to defend their beach from what they believe are youth gangs of Middle East background.[Full Story]

item.title: Teresa: I'm not a police basher.
item.description: The case of four Chinese nationals who claimed they were ill-treated by the police, followed by a video-clip of a naked woman asked to perform ear-squats in front of a policewoman in a police station propelled DAP publicity secretary Teresa Kok, 41, into the limelight....more[Full Story]

item.title: MCA appoints Tan as CC member.
item.description: KUALA LUMPUR: The MCA has appointed Datin Paduka Dr Tan Yee Kew, whose suspension sentence ended on Wednesday, as a Central Committee (CC) member .[Full Story]

item.title: I'm not a police basher:Teresa Kok
item.description: The case of four Chinese nationals who claimed they were ill-treated by the police, followed by a video-clip of a naked woman asked to perform ear-squats in front of a policewoman in a police station propelled DAP publicity secretary Teresa Kok, 41, into the limelight....more[Full Story]

item.title: Enriching youth through the arts
item.description: The inaugural AYE conference taking place in KL brings together 70 artists-cum-activists who say art is the way to empower youth and their communities[Full Story]

item.title: Raunch culture exposed
item.description: Young women are expressing their sexuality more overtly and outrageously, than ever. But in her hotly debated new book, US feminist author

item.title: Music, flowers and candles for Lennon, 25 years later
item.description: LIVERPOOL, England/NEW YORK: Fans laid flowers and lit candles on Thursday to honor music icon and peace activist John Lennon, 25 years after he was murdered outside his New York apartment.[Full Story]
